title: How to install MATLAB using KGP email ID (2022)
text:
• Visit this website
• Enter `IIT Kharagpur` as University name and enter your institute email ID.
• You will receive a mail soon(within 5 minutes) from MATLAB with a link. Go to the link
• Click on `Get Software`.
• Click on `Sign in to get started`
• Login using your institute email ID. Create an account using institute email ID if you haven't created yet .
• Download the installer and click on the downloaded file to launch it
page: How to install MATLAB using KGP email ID (2022)

title: Miscellaneous
text:
• While installing select the minimum extra tool boxes so that installation becomes quick. Toolboxes can be added later on as per requirement.
• To install a new "Add on" Click on "Home" on the top bar Click on "Add-Ons" Sign in with institute ID when asked. Type required Add On name, and click install.
• You are permitted to install MATLAB Student and Home on up to two computers and you may transfer a MATLAB Student or Home license up to two times per year. ( Source )
page: How to install MATLAB using KGP email ID (2022)
